feed.title: Activepieces Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.10
entry.content:
• fix(bulk-action): resolve issue with selecting multiple rows across different pages in tables for connections, flows, and runs (#5967) @hazemadelkhalel
  • chore:Security upgrade langchain from 0.2.19 to 0.3.3 (#5965) @abuaboud
  • feat: support bulk actions in table (#5945) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix: pdf failed to delete folder (#5969) @abuaboud
  • fix(facebook-leads): disable pages dropdown if no pages are found (#5962) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: applying tags to pieces in platform admin (#5976) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix(connections): set owner id to null when deleted (#5966) @abuaboud
  • fix(facebook-leads): disable pages dropdown if no pages are found (#5962) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: piece selector doesn't show pinned (#5959) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: Update overview.mdx to remove additional : (#5958) @alitnk

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @alitnk, @hazemadelkhalel and @snyk-bot

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.34.11
entry.content:
*feat: allow editing external ids for users in Platform Admin.

üß© Pieces

  • chore(Google Drive): list all files in the folder even if they are > 100 (#5994) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: convert pdf to image too many files error (#5979) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs(properties): added markdown variant options (#5996) @hazemadelkhalel
  • docs: Add pikapods.com hosting option (#5970) @m3nu

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @m3nu

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.35.0
entry.content:
‚õìÔ∏è‚Äçüí• Breaking Changes

  • refactor: migrate from Branches to Router (#6005) @abuaboud

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(flows): Support Files and Zip Format (#6024) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat(webhook): enhance testing experience & markdown instructions (#6011) @hazemadelkhalel

üß© Pieces

  • feat(webling): 2 triggers and get events by ID action (#5997) @felifluid
  • fix(webhook): hide headers when response type is redirect (#6016) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: google-calendar add Expand Recurring Event option (#5964) @ikus060
  • feat(human-input): unify respond actions and enhance chat file handling (#5952) @kishanprmr
  • feat(shopify): Get Customers action (#6008) @ikus060
  • feat(shopify): handle pagination to get shopify products (#6007) @ikus060
  • feat(utility-ai): advanced structured data (#6003) @abuaboud

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: make piece selector and flow templates dialog adjust their height according to available height (#6021) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: speed up deletion (#6018) @abuaboud
  • chore: delete all trigger data and move new one to s3 (#6014) @abuaboud
  • fix: save sample data when flow is not published (#6015) @abuaboud
  • fix: initially selected piece when trying to replace step (#6013) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • chore(webhook): modify the logic to save sample data (#6004) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: branches were breaking when switching from single to two values conditions (#6002) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: adjust flow canvas size to it's panel size when resizing right/left side panels (#6001) @AbdulTheActivePiecer

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: reorganize platform admin (#6026) @abuaboud
  • chore(http): move response return action to webhook piece (#5954) @kishanprmr

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add felifluid as a contributor for plugin (#6020) @allcontributors

üßπ Maintenance & Dev Experience

  • refactor: migrate from Branches to Router (#6005) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @felifluid, @hazemadelkhalel, @ikus060 and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.35.1
entry.content:
‚õìÔ∏è‚Äçüí• Breaking Changes

  • feat(connections): the ability to rename connections (#6033) @abuaboud

‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat(connections): the ability to rename connections (#6033) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • feat(claude): add claude 3.5 haiku model (#6027) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: revert to node18 to fix seg fault (#6045) @abuaboud
  • fix(flows): import flow redirection (#6040) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: overwrite flow when importing from context menu (#6039) @abuaboud
  • fix: graceful error handling (#6034) @abuaboud
  • chore: fix type checks in react-ui (#6031) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @hazemadelkhalel and @kishanprmr

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.36.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: global connections managed in platform admin (#6047) @abuaboud

üß© Pieces

  • fix(gmail): fix attachment download failure (#6055) @kishanprmr
  • feat(anthropic): update models using latest alias (#6054) @geekyme
  • chore: update webhook triggers desc (#6042) @kishanprmr
  • fix(google-sheets): fix shared drive file notification (#6043) @kishanprmr
  • feat(google-sheets): add parent folders for create spreadsheet action (#6009) @kishanprmr

üêû Bug Fixes

  • fix: delete connection (#6053) @abuaboud
  • fix: connections table status filter (#6052) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: delete connection (#6051) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: pieces should be unique in the template (#6049) @abuaboud

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: bulk delete on projects / templates table (#6050) @abuaboud

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @abuaboud, @geekyme and @kishanprmr
